thread.section_title: M is for Music – Discover Music News
thread.title: Kanye West Releases New Version of The-Dream’s “Bed”: Listen
thread.title_full: Kanye West Releases New Version of The-Dream’s “Bed”: Listen

author: Pitchfork
title: Kanye West Releases New Version of The-Dream’s “Bed”: Listen
text:
Kanye West Releases New Version of The-Dream’s “Bed”: Listen Song premiered at Yeezy Season 5 show appears on Ye’s Soundcloud Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Live Nation 
Kanye West and The-Dream have shared a new version of “Bed,” the song originally co-written by The-Dream for J. Holiday and released in 2007, as the Fader points out . The new version premiered during Kanye’s Yeezy Season 5 fashion show, where it played on a loop. The song that appeared on Ye’s Soundcloud early this morning—titled “BED YEEZY SEASON 5 (FT. THE DREAM)”—is also looped, lasting 17 minutes altogether, and doesn’t appear to feature Ye’s vocals. Check it out below and scroll down to hear the original. 
Kanye’s “Ultralight Beam” was named Pitchfork’s 2016 Song of the Year , while The Life of Pablo landed at No. 5 on our Album of the Year list. Artists In This Story
